column1: Walmart offers this product at the lowest price on the internet. This progesterone cream is a must for most women, as most of us have estrogen dominance and this balances our hormones. It is very helpful for symptoms of menopause, peri-menopause and PCOS. I feel normal again!
This stuff has been working great for my postmenopausal symptoms. I've been getting such relief. Highly recommend it!
Love using this product for balance. Will purchase again. Thanks Smoky Mountain Naturals!
I've noticed a difference, and it's great that the progesterone is bio-identical.
